backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, booking lead creation, and rate card storage with admin/staff authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature fix related to one‑way trip pricing with referenced frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to their descriptions for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme definitions for light and dark modes with shared design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry page loading the React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing routing, mode-based behavior (owner/customer), authentication flow, and actor initialization states.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell with header, navigation, share dialog, and auth-aware menu options for owner and customer modes.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple logo component rendering square or wide variants of the BISMI CABS asset.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a styled fallback UI with reload option and error details.
frontend/src/components/OwnerNotAuthoriz: Displays an unauthorized access message, shows the user’s principal ID with copy support, and offers optional navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/RatePricingSecti: Renders pricing tables and notes for hourly, local transfer, and rental vehicle rates using predefined rate constants.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCard: Provides customer and owner URLs with copy-to-clipboard and open-link actions for sharing the app.
frontend/src/components/TripTotalCalcula: Calculates estimated trip cost based on vehicle type, trip type, and distance, showing a cost breakdown.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays the logged-in user’s profile picture or a fallback avatar using profile data from a query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Builds an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with optional admin initialization and exposes loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Custom React hook for reading and writing typed values to localStorage with SSR safety.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend actor operations such as booking leads, admin checks, rate card actions, and user profile handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up the QueryClient, and wraps the app with the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BookingFormPage.tsx: Booking form page that validates input and submits new booking leads, showing success and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Leads management page that fetches booking leads, checks admin/authorization, handles polling, notifications, and displays lead details.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login UI, manages Internet Identity authentication, and conditionally shows navigation buttons based on app mode and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides profile initialization and display picture upload with validation, preview, progress tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/RateCardPage.tsx: Displays rate pricing, allows authenticated admins to upload a rate card, and lets users download the latest stored file.
frontend/src/utils/appMode.ts: Determines, retrieves, and persists the app’s customer/owner mode using URL or session state.
frontend/src/utils/canonicalUrl.ts: Generates shareable canonical URLs with optional mode and deep-link parameters and copies them to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Creates a Blob from bytes and triggers a browser download for a given filename and content type.
frontend/src/utils/mapBackendError.ts: Maps backend error messages to user-friendly text, categorizing common authorization, profile, file, and network issues.
frontend/src/utils/rates.ts: Defines vehicle rate constants and helper functions for calculating per‑km rates, allowances, hourly rates, and billable distance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from either storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project state, known issues, and a fix request for correcting one-way trip fare calculations.
